info.name: Cricket Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Cricket Backend Management System

request.description: Create a new tournament type
Get all tournament types
Get a specific tournament type by ID
Update an existing tournament type
Delete a tournament type
Create a new match type
Create ODI match type
Create Test match type
Get all match types
Get a specific match type by ID
Update an existing match type
Delete a match type
Create a new umpire official
Create a match referee official
Create a TV umpire official
Create a reserve umpire official
Get all officials
Get a specific official by ID
Update an existing official
Delete an official
Create a new tournament. Requires valid match_type, tournament_type, and officials IDs.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Women's Cricket World Cup 2025",
  "description": "ICC Women's Cricket World Cup 2025",
  "season": "2025",
  "locations": ["Auckland", "Wellington", "Christchurch"],
  "logo": "https://example.com/wwc-logo.png",
  "banner_image": "https://example.com/wwc-banner.png",
  "gender": "F",
  "match_type": "{{matchTypeId}}",
  "tournament_type": "{{tournamentTypeId}}",
  "officials": ["{{officialId}}"]
}

request.description: Create a women's tournament
Get all tournaments
Get a specific tournament by ID
Update an existing tournament. All fields are optional.
Delete a tournament
Create a new male player
Create a new female player
Create a player with only required fields
Get all players
Get a specific player by ID
Update an existing player. All fields are optional.
Delete a player
Create a new venue with all fields
Create Eden Gardens venue
Create a venue with only required fields
Get all venues
Get a specific venue by ID
Update an existing venue. All fields are optional.
Delete a venue

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Mumbai Indians",
  "slogan": "Duniya Hila Denge Hum",
  "description": "Mumbai Indians is a franchise cricket team based in Mumbai, Maharashtra, that plays in the Indian Premier League.",
  "banner_image": "https://example.com/mi-banner.jpg",
  "logo": "https://example.com/mi-logo.png",
  "players": ["{{playerId}}"]
}

request.description: Create a new team with all fields

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Chennai Super Kings",
  "slogan": "Whistle Podu",
  "description": "Chennai Super Kings is an Indian franchise cricket team based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu.",
  "banner_image": "https://example.com/csk-banner.jpg",
  "logo": "https://example.com/csk-logo.png",
  "players": ["{{playerId}}"]
}

request.description: Create Chennai Super Kings team
Create a team with only required fields (without players)
Create a team with players array
Get all teams
Get a specific team by ID
Update an existing team. All fields are optional.
Delete a team

item.name: Stages

request.description: Create a new stage for a tournament
Create knockout stage
Create finals stage
Get all stages for a specific tournament
Get a specific stage by ID
Update an existing stage. All fields are optional.
Delete a stage

item.description: Stages CRUD operations (e.g., Group Stage, Knockout, Finals)

item.name: Matches

request.description: Create a new match
Get all matches
Get all matches for a specific tournament
Get all matches for a specific stage
Get a specific match by ID
Update an existing match
Delete a match (also removes associated players and officials)
Update the target for a match
Update the toss result. Decision can be BAT or BOWL

item.name: Update Match Outcome - Win by Runs

request.description: Update match outcome for a win by runs

item.name: Update Match Outcome - Win by Wickets

request.description: Update match outcome for a win by wickets
Update match outcome for a draw
Add a player to a match
Get all players for a specific match
Get all players for a specific team in a match
Update a match player's details
Remove a player from a match
Add an official to a match. Type can be: umpire, tv_umpire, reserve_umpire, match_refree
Get all officials for a specific match
Update a match official's details
Remove an official from a match

item.description: Matches management including match details, players, officials, target, toss result, and outcome
